game.name: Public Defense Corp
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In the far-off year of 20XX, constant attacks and hostility from an evil secret society have caused several private defense companies to spring up around Japan. Determined to get revenge for the destruction of her hometown, Haruka joins the public defense corp!
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the far-off year of 20XX, constant attacks and hostility from an evil secret society have caused several private defense companies to spring up around Japan. Determined to get revenge for the destruction of her hometown, Haruka joins the public defense corp!

reviewHighlights.text: 그림체가 이뻐보이지만... 실질적으로는 스탠딩계열뿐. 게임도 다소 노가다를 요구함
